name: Acid Drop (itch)
description:
Acid Drop Description

Acid Drop is an 3d Abandoned Lab Themed Escape Room. Challenge yourself to solve the puzzles so you can escape! The Goal Is Simple, Drop the Acid Levels so the air is breathable!

You can always walk outside of the room, but is it safe to do so? Now with a timer to allow you to challenge yourself! Compete with friends to get the fastest time! Acid Drop is a game Created for my University "AINT 253" Module, Design Process.

Get a sneak peak with the YouTube walk through or simple Download and find out for yourself!

Features
  • Explore Escape room to Solve Puzzles
  • Multiple Outcomes! Only One Is Safe
  • Find Hidden Codes To Open The Safe
  • Find the Correct Levels when you "Drop" the Acid!
Controls
  •  W A S D   Or  ↑ ←↓ →  >>>  Move Up, Left, Down & Right
  • Mouse Movement >>> Aim
  • "E"  >>> Interact
  • ESC  >>> Pause Game
Install Instructions
  • Unzip File.
  • Extract "Acid Drop" File
  • Run "Acid Drop".
  • Select Correct Monitor, Resolution & Game Quality!
  • Enjoy Droping The Acid!
